timeline.message:
refactor sourceIndex out of RollupV2Config

this commit extracts the sourceIndex from the RollupV2Config. It
was not a natural fit. The sourceIndex will now be a part of the
RollupAction.Request.

relates #42720.

refactor sourceIndex out of RollupV2Config

this commit extracts the sourceIndex from the RollupV2Config. It
was not a natural fit. The sourceIndex will now be a part of the
RollupAction.Request.

relates #42720.

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps we can rename it from RollupV2Config to RollupActionConfig, since there is only a single rollup action.
timeline.author: csoulios
